KnowledgeBase.Title: varp
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: range kurtosis skew stdev stdevp var
KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords: standard deviation variance distribution population curve displacement mean

Function.Description: The varp function computes the variance of a population based on the values of the entire population specified in the argument list.

Brief.Overview: The varp function computes the variance of a population based on the values of the entire population specified in the argument list. Variance measures the spread or variation of values from the mean.
Brief.Usage: The varp function is useful for determining if , and determining how much, the variance of a population based on the values of the entire population specified in the argument list. To analyze a sample set of values, see the var function.

Syntax.Return: The variance of a population based on a sample of values specified in the argument list.
